MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH44 postcode are of Innerleithen. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:20pm due to a fault on the underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further works required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00PM We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15PM on 29th April 2021.
